クラス
org.gjt.sp.jedit.buffer.FoldHandler の使用

FoldHandler を使用しているパッケージ
org.gjt.sp.jedit This package contains jEdit's core classes. 
org.gjt.sp.jedit.buffer Buffer event listeners, and classes used to implement jEdit's document model. 
 

org.gjt.sp.jedit での FoldHandler の使用
 

FoldHandler を返す org.gjt.sp.jedit のメソッド
 FoldHandler ServiceManager.ServiceFoldHandlerProvider.getFoldHandler(java.lang.String name)
          Returns the fold handler with the specified name, or null if there is no registered handler with that name.
 

org.gjt.sp.jedit.buffer での FoldHandler の使用
 

org.gjt.sp.jedit.buffer での FoldHandler のサブクラス
 class DummyFoldHandler
          A fold handler that does nothing.
 class ExplicitFoldHandler
          A fold handler that folds lines based on markers ("{{{" and "}}}") embedded in the text.
 class IndentFoldHandler
          A fold handler that folds lines based on their indent level.
 

FoldHandler を返す org.gjt.sp.jedit.buffer のメソッド
 FoldHandler JEditBuffer.getFoldHandler()
          Returns the current buffer's fold handler.
 FoldHandler FoldHandlerProvider.getFoldHandler(java.lang.String name)
          Returns the fold handler with the specified name, or null if there is no registered handler with that name.
static FoldHandler FoldHandler.getFoldHandler(java.lang.String name)
          Returns the fold handler with the specified name, or null if there is no registered handler with that name.
 FoldHandler DefaultFoldHandlerProvider.getFoldHandler(java.lang.String name)
          Returns the fold handler with the specified name, or null if there is no registered handler with that name.
 

FoldHandler 型のパラメータを持つ org.gjt.sp.jedit.buffer のメソッド
 void DefaultFoldHandlerProvider.addFoldHandler(FoldHandler foldHandler)
          Add a new FoldHander.
 void JEditBuffer.setFoldHandler(FoldHandler foldHandler)
          Sets the buffer's fold handler.
